original_text: This will be my third visit to you. “Every matter must be established by the testimony of two or three witnesses.”
korean_text: 내가 이제 세 번째 너희에게 가리니 두세 증인의 입으로 말마다 확정하리라

sentences.original_text: This will be my third visit to you
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 내가 당신에게 세 번째 방문하는 것입니다

sentences.original_text: by the testimony of two or three witnesses
